Subject: HWA-EPP4-U8800 Hotfix 1.1 installs successfully but is still available.
Description:
Have applied the following update "successfully" but upon "Check for updates" it keeps appearing as available. It appears as successfully applied 3 times so far in "View applied EPP updates":

Security Update – EPP Server Hotfix #1.1 – Important Security Updates for EPP Server (HWA-EPP4-U8800)

Furthermore, the "Backend" has a lot of available updates. Should those be applied as well?
Solution_Comment__c:
Deployed: Hotfix adv-2024-002

- checked that the EPP server hotfix was applied
- provided EPP clients and the Offline EPP client Patch which we installed
- Applied the Backend Security Updates and made sure that no other Security Updates are pending.
